      Service ServiceStepServiceImpl.defineWorkFlowForService(java.lang.String creatorId, java.lang.Long serviceId, java.util.List<ServiceStep> steps)
      Access is checked Inputs are validated Order is calculated Existing workflow for service is flushed from DB New workflow is updated in DB Because this operation affects all the branches as they might have now different set of services they can offer based on counter-service step step mapping.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.Long> CounterServiceImpl.getStepIdstoBeAdded(java.lang.Long counterId, java.util.List<ServiceStep> steps)
      Service steps are validated for null entries Step Ids are validated for their presence in DB Existing step ids for the specified counter which already exist in DB are filtered out
